name: @rainstormy/presets-biome
description: Predefined, opinionated Biome configurations suitable for any web project.
author: Steffen Diswal

// devDependencies.@biomejs/biome: Biome is an opinionated linter and code formatter.
// devDependencies.lefthook: Lefthook is a Git hooks manager.

// peerDependencies.@biomejs/biome: The preset is made for Biome. When declared as a peer dependency, the package manager will remind the user to install it. The limited version range ensures compatibility with the nursery rules in Biome.
